item.text: Then after fourteen years I went up to Jerusalem again with Barnabas, taking Titus along too.

I <st data-num="305" class="">went</st> there<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">because of</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="602" class="">revelation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="394" class="">presented</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I did so<n id="4" /> only <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2398">private</st> meeting with the <st data-num="1380">influential people</st>,<n id="5" /> to <st data-num="3361 4458">make sure</st> that I was <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">running</st>—<st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> had <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">run</st><n id="6" />—<st data-num="1519">in</st> <st data-num="2756" class="">vain</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3761">not even</st> <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st>, who was <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="315" class="">compelled</st> to be <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st>, although he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="1672" class="">Greek</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> this matter <st data-num="3920" class="">arose</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="5569" class="">false brothers</st> with false pretenses<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3922" class="">slipped in unnoticed</st> to <st data-num="2684" class="">spy on</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1657" class="">freedom</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2615" class="">make</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2615" class="">slaves</st>.<n id="4" />
But we did not surrender to them even for a moment, in order that the truth of the gospel would remain with you.
But from those who were influential (whatever they were makes no difference to me; God shows no favoritism between people)—those influential leaders added nothing to my message.

<st data-num="235 5121">On the contrary</st>, when they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I was <st data-num="4100" class="">entrusted</st> with the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> to the <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcised</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was <st data-num="4100" class="">entrusted</st> with the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> to the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st><n id="3" />

(<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he who <st data-num="1754" class="">empowered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> his <st data-num="651" class="">apostleship</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1754" class="">empowered</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> my apostleship <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>)<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2786" class="">Cephas</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, who had a <st data-num="1380" class="">reputation</st> <st data-num="1510">as</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4769" class="">pillars</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1097">recognized</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> that had been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> to <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="1188" class="">right hand</st> of <st data-num="2842" class="">fellowship</st>, <st data-num="2443">agreeing<n id="6" /> that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> would go <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st>.<n id="7" />
They requested only that we remember the poor, the very thing I also was eager to do.
But when Cephas came to Antioch, I opposed him to his face, because he had clearly done wrong.

<st data-num="4253">Until</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100">certain people</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, he had been <st data-num="4906" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="2064" class="">arrived</st>, he <st data-num="5288">stopped doing</st> this<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="873" class="">separated</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st><n id="3" /> because he was <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> of those who were <st data-num="1537 4061">pro-circumcision</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> also <st data-num="4942" class="">joined with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in this <st data-num="4942">hypocrisy</st>, <st data-num="5620" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> was <st data-num="4879">led astray with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="1" /> by their <st data-num="5272" class="">hypocrisy</st>.

But when I saw that they were not behaving consistently with the truth of the gospel, I said to Cephas in front of them all, “If you, although you are a Jew, live like a Gentile and not like a Jew, how can you try to force the Gentiles to live like Jews?”
We are Jews by birth and not Gentile sinners,

<st data-num="1161" class="">yet</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="444">one</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1437 3361">but</st> <st data-num="1223">by</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have come to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may be <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">one</st><n id="7" /> will be <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> while <st data-num="2212" class="">seeking</st> to be <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> we <st data-num="846" class="">ourselves</st> have <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> been <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> to be <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, is <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="687" class="">then</st> one who <st data-num="1249" class="">encourages</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>? <st data-num="1096" class="">Absolutely</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>!

<st data-num="1063">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="3618" class="">build up</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="3778">those</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> I once <st data-num="2647" class="">destroyed</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="4921" class="">demonstrate</st> that <st data-num="1683" class="">I am one</st> who <st data-num="3848" class="">breaks God’s law</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> to the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

I have been <st data-num="4957" class="">crucified</st> with <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> it is <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> who <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739">the life</st> I <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st>,<n id="3" /> I <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722">because of</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="4" /> who <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
I do not set aside God’s grace, because if righteousness could come through the law, then Christ died for nothing!
